name: Clank
description: Sentient mechanical beings built from various materials like metal, wood, and stone.

features.name: Purposeful Design
features.description: Choose one of your Experiences that aligns with your purpose and gain a permanent +1 bonus to it.

features.name: Efficient
features.description: When you take a short rest, you can choose a long rest move instead of a short rest move.

name: Drakona
description: Humanoid dragons with thick scales and a powerful elemental breath, but no wings.

features.name: Scales
features.description: When you would take Severe damage, you can mark a Stress to mark 1 fewer Hit Point.

features.name: Elemental Breath
features.description: Choose an element (e.g., fire, ice). You can use this as an Instinct weapon dealing d8 magic damage.

name: Dwarf
description: Short, sturdy humanoids with dense musculature and a natural resilience.

features.name: Thick Skin
features.description: When you take Minor damage, you can mark 2 Stress instead of marking a Hit Point.

features.name: Increased Fortitude
features.description: Spend 3 Hope to halve incoming physical damage.

name: Elf
description: Tall humanoids with pointed ears, attuned senses, and the ability to enter a celestial trance instead of sleeping.

features.name: Quick Reactions
features.description: Mark a Stress to gain advantage on a reaction roll.

features.name: Celestial Trance
features.description: During a rest, you can drop into a trance to choose an additional downtime move.

name: Faerie
description: Winged humanoids with insectile features who undergo a metamorphosis during their life.

features.name: Luckbender
features.description: Once per session, after you or a willing ally makes an action roll, spend 3 Hope to reroll the Duality Dice.

features.name: Wings
features.description: You can fly. While flying, you can mark a Stress after an adversary attacks you to gain a +2 bonus to Evasion against it.

name: Faun
description: Humanoid goats with curving horns, cloven hooves, and powerful legs for leaping.

features.name: Caprine Leap
features.description: You can leap anywhere within Close range as though it were normal movement.

features.name: Kick
features.description: On a successful Melee attack, mark a Stress to deal an extra 2d6 damage and knock yourself or the target to Very Close range.

name: Firbolg
description: Bovine humanoids, often tall and muscular, with broad noses and drooping ears.

features.name: Charge
features.description: On a successful Agility Roll to move from Far range into Melee, mark a Stress to deal 1d12 physical damage to all targets in Melee.

features.name: Unshakable
features.description: When you would mark a Stress, roll a d6. On a 6, don't mark it.

name: Fungril
description: Humanoid mushrooms of incredible variety who can communicate via a nonverbal mycelial network.

features.name: Fungril Network
features.description: Make an Instinct Roll (12) to use your mycelial array to speak with other fungril across any distance.

features.name: Death Connection
features.description: While touching a recent corpse, mark a Stress to extract one memory from it related to a specific emotion.

name: Galapa
description: Anthropomorphic turtles with large, domed shells into which they can retract for protection.

features.name: Shell
features.description: Gain a bonus to your damage thresholds equal to your Proficiency.

features.name: Retract
features.description: Mark a Stress to retract into your shell. You gain resistance to physical damage but have disadvantage and cannot move.

name: Giant
description: Towering humanoids with one to three eyes, broad shoulders, and elongated arms.

features.name: Endurance
features.description: Gain an additional Hit Point slot.

features.name: Reach
features.description: Treat any Melee range weapon, ability, or spell as though it has a Very Close range instead.

name: Goblin
description: Small humanoids with large eyes and massive ears, granting them keen senses in the dark.

features.name: Surefooted
features.description: You ignore disadvantage on Agility Rolls.

features.name: Danger Sense
features.description: Once per rest, mark a Stress to force an adversary to reroll an attack against you or a nearby ally.

name: Halfling
description: Small humanoids with large, hairy feet and a natural attunement to the world's magnetic fields.

features.name: Luckbringer
features.description: At the start of each session, everyone in your party gains a Hope.

features.name: Internal Compass
features.description: When you roll a 1 on your Hope Die, you can reroll it.

name: Human
description: Physically adaptable people with dexterous hands and bodies built for endurance.

features.name: High Stamina
features.description: Gain an additional Stress slot.

features.name: Adaptability
features.description: When you fail a roll that utilized one of your Experiences, you can mark a Stress to reroll.

name: Infernis
description: Descendants of demons, possessing horns, pointed ears, and a 'dread visage' they can manifest.

features.name: Fearless
features.description: When you roll with Fear, you can mark 2 Stress to change it into a roll with Hope instead.

features.name: Dread Visage
features.description: You have advantage on rolls to intimidate hostile creatures.

name: Katari
description: Feline humanoids with retractable claws, heightened senses, and incredible agility.

features.name: Feline Instincts
features.description: When you make an Agility Roll, you can spend 2 Hope to reroll your Hope Die.

features.name: Retracting Claws
features.description: Make an Agility Roll to scratch a target in Melee range. On a success, they become temporarily Vulnerable.

name: Orc
description: Humanoids with square features and boar-like tusks that protrude from their lower jaw.

features.name: Sturdy
features.description: When you have 1 Hit Point remaining, attacks against you have disadvantage.

features.name: Tusks
features.description: On a successful Melee attack, spend a Hope to gore the target with your tusks, dealing an extra 1d6 damage.

name: Ribbet
description: Anthropomorphic frogs with protruding eyes, webbed hands and feet, and a long, prehensile tongue.

features.name: Amphibious
features.description: You can breathe and move naturally underwater.

features.name: Long Tongue
features.description: Mark a Stress to use your tongue as a Finesse Close weapon that deals d12 physical damage.

name: Simiah
description: Anthropomorphic monkeys and apes with long limbs and prehensile feet, making them skilled climbers.

features.name: Natural Climber
features.description: You have advantage on Agility Rolls that involve balancing and climbing.

features.name: Nimble
features.description: Gain a permanent +1 bonus to your Evasion.
